title: Footballers face rape inquiry over video of naked woman in dressing room
text:
Belgian footballers from club Espoir Minerois facing rape allegations (Picture: Social Media)

Rape allegations have been made against members of a Belgian football team after video emerged of a player having sex in the clubhouse with a naked woman.

The footage, posted to social media, shows the woman crawling naked on the floor of the cafeteria and having sex with a player on a message bench following a September training session.

Another shows her sitting naked on a stool with players all around.

Her mother, speaking to Sudinfo, said she was ‘not in a normal state’ and likely to be under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

She wants the case to make its way through the courts as there was more going on ‘than they want to say’.

According to reports in Belgian media, one of the players admitted things may have gone too far but the woman consented. The report involves the rape allegations and spreading immoral material

The club at the centre of the scandal, Espoir Minerios, plays in the provincial league in the Liege district.

Its president Joseph Gaillard said: ‘I was informed by the parents of one of our teenagers.

‘So far we only know that some players were present, but we do not know exactly what happened.

‘We will get to the bottom of the whole story, which is just going to be huge,’ reported Grenzecho.

Minerios has already imposed sanctions on some of the players and Mr Gaillard confirmed he has spoken with a lawyer to defend the club’s interests.

One player was reportedly banned for a month while another was forced to train with the second XI. The video was filmed by one of the club’s players The judicial inquiry was launched after the complaint was raised by the woman and her family.

District attorney Gilles de Villers Grandchamps said: ‘Indeed, we put together a report on Tuesday, which was sent to my office for criminal information in this context. ‘The report retains two elements: rape and dissemination of images contrary to morality. The investigation will have to analyse the facts regarding the rape and the qualification will be chosen at the end of the investigation.’ Two players are clearly identifiable in the videos with a further three others said to be involved.
